name: Discard Border Objects
title: Discard Border Objects
description: Discard Border Objects plugin clear objects which touch image borders and squentially relabelling of image objects
author: Hamdah Shafqat Abbasi (hamdah.abbasi@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input label image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: groupBy
inputs.description: Select a parameter to generate filepatterns in specific order
